languages.text: "Никогда бы не подумал, что на флагмане фон Валанциус будет происходить такое... чудовищное непотребство. Я уже устал наказывать офицеров за неуставные разговоры о том, что вытворяет Лорд-капитан и ксенос на нижних палубах..."

"I never thought such... monstrous iniquity would take place on the von Valancius flagship. I am sick of reprimanding officers for improper chatter about what the Lord Captain and the xenos are up to on the lower decks..."
languages.original_text: "Никогда бы не подумал, что на флагмане фон Валанциус будет происходить такое... чудовищное непотребство. Я уже устал наказывать офицеров за неуставные разговоры о том, что вытворяет Лорд-капитан и ксенос на нижних палубах..."

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I never thought such... monstrous iniquity would take place on the von Valancius flagship. I am sick of reprimanding officers for improper chatter about what the Lord Captain and the xenos are up to on the lower decks..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I never thought such... monstrous iniquity would take place on the von Valancius flagship. I am sick of reprimanding officers for improper chatter about what the Lord Captain and the xenos are up to on the lower decks..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我从未想过冯·瓦兰修斯的旗舰上竟会发生如此……罪大恶极的事情。军官们对舰长大人与那个异形在下层甲板上的所作所为议论纷纷，而我甚至没有心力再去喝止他们……”
languages.original_text: "I never thought such... monstrous iniquity would take place on the von Valancius flagship. I am sick of reprimanding officers for improper chatter about what the Lord Captain and the xenos are up to on the lower decks..."

traits.locale_text: “我从未想过冯·瓦兰修斯的旗舰上竟会发生如此……罪大恶极的事情。军官们对舰长大人与那个异形在下层甲板上的所作所为议论纷纷，而我甚至没有心力再去喝止他们……”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'aurais jamais cru voir un jour de telles... iniquités avoir lieu sur le vaisseau amiral des von Valancius. J'en ai plus qu'assez d'entendre les officiers commérer sur ce que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} fait avec les xénos sur les ponts inférieurs... et de devoir les réprimander à chaque fois. »
languages.original_text: "I never thought such... monstrous iniquity would take place on the von Valancius flagship. I am sick of reprimanding officers for improper chatter about what the Lord Captain and the xenos are up to on the lower decks..."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'aurais jamais cru voir un jour de telles... iniquités avoir lieu sur le vaisseau amiral des von Valancius. J'en ai plus qu'assez d'entendre les officiers commérer sur ce que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} fait avec les xénos sur les ponts inférieurs... et de devoir les réprimander à chaque fois. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Nunca pensé que pudiera darse tan... monstruosa inmoralidad a bordo de la nave insignia von Valancius. Estoy harto de acallar la cháchara indecorosa de los oficiales sobre lo que hacen {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y el xenos en las cubiertas inferiores...».
languages.original_text: "I never thought such... monstrous iniquity would take place on the von Valancius flagship. I am sick of reprimanding officers for improper chatter about what the Lord Captain and the xenos are up to on the lower decks..."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca pensé que pudiera darse tan... monstruosa inmoralidad a bordo de la nave insignia von Valancius. Estoy harto de acallar la cháchara indecorosa de los oficiales sobre lo que hacen {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y el xenos en las cubiertas inferiores...».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス旗艦でこのような…とんでもない不義が行われるとは思ってもみませんでした。ロード・キャプテンと異種族が下部デッキで何を企んでいるのか、不適切なおしゃべりをした士官を叱責するのはもううんざりです…」
languages.original_text: "I never thought such... monstrous iniquity would take place on the von Valancius flagship. I am sick of reprimanding officers for improper chatter about what the Lord Captain and the xenos are up to on the lower decks..."

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス旗艦でこのような…とんでもない不義が行われるとは思ってもみませんでした。ロード・キャプテンと異種族が下部デッキで何を企んでいるのか、不適切なおしゃべりをした士官を叱責するのはもううんざりです…」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass solch ... monströse Frevelhaftigkeit auf dem Valancius-Flaggschiff stattfinden könnte. Ich bin es leid, Offiziere wegen unangemessener Gespräche darüber zu ermahnen, was der Lord Captain und der Xenos auf den Unterdecks treiben ..."
languages.original_text: "I never thought such... monstrous iniquity would take place on the von Valancius flagship. I am sick of reprimanding officers for improper chatter about what the Lord Captain and the xenos are up to on the lower decks..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass solch ... monströse Frevelhaftigkeit auf dem Valancius-Flaggschiff stattfinden könnte. Ich bin es leid, Offiziere wegen unangemessener Gespräche darüber zu ermahnen, was der Lord Captain und der Xenos auf den Unterdecks treiben ..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I never thought such... monstrous iniquity would take place on the von Valancius flagship. I am sick of reprimanding officers for improper chatter about what the Lord Captain and the xenos are up to on the lower decks..."

languages.text: "Von Valancius sancak gemisinin böyle bir... Kepazeliğe sahne olacağını asla tahayyül edemezdim. Subaylara Lord Kaptan'la o zenonun dedikodusunu yapmamalarını söylemekten dilimde tüy bitti."
languages.original_text: "I never thought such... monstrous iniquity would take place on the von Valancius flagship. I am sick of reprimanding officers for improper chatter about what the Lord Captain and the xenos are up to on the lower decks..."

traits.locale_text: "von Valancius sancak gemisinin böyle bir... Kepazeliğe sahne olacağını asla tahayyül edemezdim. Subaylara Lord Kaptan'la o zenonun dedikodusunu yapmayın, demekten dilimde tüy bitti..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
